name: .MAI File Extension
summary: Learn about .MAI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Single mail file processed by Microsoft Mail, Microsoft's mail server program; contains actual message data and may be referenced by one or more mailbag record (.MBG) files.

content: Microsoft Mail was introduced in 1991 and has since been replaced by Microsoft Outlook.
